LanguageData.BWA_AramidCloth.label: carbon-aramid composite
LanguageData.BWA_AramidCloth.description:
Carbon-aramid composite is an enhanced next-generation aramid fiber, produced through high-pressure electrospinning and carbon-nanotube reinforcement.
It reaches roughly three times the tensile strength of conventional aramid while being about 30% lighter, and it offers excellent heat resistance and cut resistance. Its unique cross-linked molecular structure dissipates kinetic energy efficiently, allowing it to withstand direct hits from small-caliber armor-piercing rounds.
